radio_group.name: use_external_browser

radio_item.name: external
radio_item.tool_tip: Use the default system web browser for help, web links, etc. This won't affect the SL web-based profiles and search which always use the built-in browser in their own floater.

radio_group.radio_item: Use external web browser (Firefox, Chrome, Opera, etc)

radio_item.name: internal
radio_item.tool_tip: Use the built-in web browser for help, web links, etc. This browser opens as a new window inside the viewer.

button.name: clear_cache
button.label: Clear Browser Cache
button.tool_tip: Clear the built-in web browser cache.

check_box.tool_tip: Enable cookies in the web media plugin (the SL web profiles can't work when this option is disabled).
check_box.label: Accept cookies from sites
check_box.name: cookies_enabled

button.name: clear_cookies
button.label: Clear Stored Cookies
button.tool_tip: Clear the built-in web browser cookies.

check_box.tool_tip: Enable javascript in the web media plugin (the SL web based search can't work when this option is disabled).
check_box.label: Enable Javascript
check_box.name: javascript_enabled

check_box.tool_tip: Allow the web media plugin to launch and use other plugins.
check_box.label: Enable plugins
check_box.name: plugins_enabled

check_box.label: Use a proxy for the built-in web plugin and browser
check_box.name: web_proxy_enabled

line_editor.name: web_proxy_editor
line_editor.tool_tip: The name or IP address of the proxy you would like to use
